channel.title: Making shops open when you talk to an npc?
channel.description: I know this is a stupid question i used to know how to do it but i haven't done my server in a while and none of the old shops are working. I used to have npcs talk to you or open a shop when u talk to them but all of a sudden nothing is working. So imma try and start from scratch so please tell me how to do this.
